title: Hygrometer
alt: I'm working on assembling a combination declinometer, sclerometer, viscometer, aleurometer, stalagmometer, and hypsometer. I'm making good progress according to my ometerometer, a device which shows the rate at which I'm acquiring measurement devices.
transcript:
[Megan and Cueball are walking and talking. Cueball is holding his phone with one hand, looking at it.]
Megan: ...A hygrometer is a device for measuring—
Cueball: I want one! Ooh, found one for $7.99 with free shipping! I'm buying it.
Megan: —Humidity.
Cueball: Oh, cool![Caption below the frame:]
For some reason, I feel a powerful compulsion to own any device whose name ends in "-ometer."
